 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָתַק‎</span>] **verb** ==bind== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***close up*** and ***repair, sew up***; Talmud <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִיתְקָא‎</span> ***fenced enclosure***); — 

**Pu\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֻתְּקוּ בַזִּקִּים‎</span> [[Nah.3.10|Nah 3:10]] her great ones ***were bound with fetters*** **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵרָתֵק‎</span> [[Eccl.12.6|Eccl 12:6]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ירחק‎</span> [[BDB#Kt|Kt]]), from context = ***be snapped, broken***; read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִנָּתֵק‎</span> (Pfannkuche [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] and modern).
